jobDescription: POSITION SUMMARY:This position is focused on driving innovation in the core business, including projects analyzing data from our extensive call-center operations, our network of roadside assistance service providers, and helping other groups understand and make use of the insights gained from the analyses in the Data Science and Analytics group. ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS:Research and experiment with Agero's call-center and roadside assistance dispatch data to gain new insights and drive innovationDevelop models and prescriptive analyses to help optimize the performance of our extensive service provider network, from dispatching models, new recruiting tools, etc.Develop automated analysis and reporting processes, reusable tools to improve modeling and analysis workflowsCreate dashboards, data products, and deploy models for use by stakeholdersHelp to guide future call-center policies and procedures through data-driven analysisImprove processes of identification/remediation of faults and gaps in our service provider networkParticipate in research projects throughout the full process: problem definition, data gathering and cleaning, proof-of-concept analysis, full-scale analysis, model building, productionalization, etc.Communicate research results effectively in written and spoken forms to various audiences including product management, engineering, executives, and customers.
